Sponsored by: https://www.TheDayAfterCovid.com
Is there an item that is taking up much of your attention?
Having trouble focusing on what you need to?
Getting anxiety from all the talk about the dreaded C-word? 

You DON’T need to disconnect, you just need to Tune It Out. 

Tune It Out allows you to browse the web while limiting distractions and triggers. 


FEATURES

-EASILY ACTIVATE/DEACTIVATE
Multiple users on a computer? Getting FOMO? 1-click activation/deactivation

-CLICK TO UNBLUR
Want to see a blocked item? Simply click to instantly reveal

-WORKS EVERYWHERE
News, Social Media, Whatsapp…you name it. If it’s on your browser, the filter will work.

- PREBUILT CATEGORIES
Coronavirus, Trump, Politics, War-related (for veterans), Sexual Violence…all included categories. Simply select the categories you want to block out and we do the rest.

- PESONALIZE
Create Your Own Category. Add individual words to block out. The control is 100% yours.

-OFFLINE
Lose internet connection? Browsing preloaded sites? Tune It Out will work as usual

Calmer, Safer, Focused browsing- you determine what and when to Tune It Out
